Dear Hagop,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

I am writing to request your guidance regarding the possibility of claiming the traffic count device as detailed in the information below. IT is awaiting confirmation to proceed with the purchase order replacement. As you are aware, it is imperative for us to have the traffic count device in place and operational without undue delay.

 

Your prompt assistance in this matter would be greatly appreciated.

 

Kind regards,

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

Dear Hagop,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

I am writing to inform you about the damage caused by the ceiling leakage and the associated costs. The installation of sensors to address this issue is priced at 3,400 AED per unit. Please let me know if you require any additional information or details.

 

@Roula Saman <mailto:Roula.Saman@chalhoub.com>  could you kindly provide a photograph of the ceiling damage for reference, as well as the complete quotation if available?

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

 

Best regards,

Dear Hagop,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

I am writing to request your guidance regarding the possibility of claiming the traffic count device as detailed in the information below. IT is awaiting confirmation to proceed with the purchase order replacement. As you are aware, it is imperative for us to have the traffic count device in place and operational without undue delay.

 

Your prompt assistance in this matter would be greatly appreciated.

 

Kind regards,

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

Dear Hagop,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

I am writing to inform you about the damage caused by the ceiling leakage and the associated costs. The installation of sensors to address this issue is priced at 3,400 AED per unit. Please let me know if you require any additional information or details.

 

@Roula Saman <mailto:Roula.Saman@chalhoub.com>  could you kindly provide a photograph of the ceiling damage for reference, as well as the complete quotation if available?

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

 

Best regards,

Subject: RE: YSL Dubai Mall & YSL Mall of the Emirates Device Offline Alert

 

Dear Hagop,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

I am writing to request your guidance regarding the possibility of claiming the traffic count device as detailed in the information below. IT is awaiting confirmation to proceed with the purchase order replacement. As you are aware, it is imperative for us to have the traffic count device in place and operational without undue delay.

 

Your prompt assistance in this matter would be greatly appreciated.

 

Kind regards,

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

Dear Hagop,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

I am writing to inform you about the damage caused by the ceiling leakage and the associated costs. The installation of sensors to address this issue is priced at 3,400 AED per unit. Please let me know if you require any additional information or details.

 

@Roula Saman <mailto:Roula.Saman@chalhoub.com>  could you kindly provide a photograph of the ceiling damage for reference, as well as the complete quotation if available?

 

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

 

Best regards,

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​
